titleStmt.title: The declaration of James Duke of Monmouth, & the noblemen, gentlemen & others, now in arms, for defence & vindication of the Protestant religion, & the laws, rights, & privilieges of England, from the invasion made upon them, & for delivering the kingdom from the usurpation & tyranny of James Duke of York
titleStmt.author: Monmouth, James Scott, Duke of, 1649-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
